name: ElevenLabs Isolate Voice
author: Shinkai
description: Isolates audio from YouTube videos or processes local audio files using ElevenLabs API.

ELEVENLABS_API_KEY.description: ElevenLabs API key for voice isolation. Required for authentication

audio_file.description: Path to input audio file. Supports common formats (mp3, wav, etc)

youtube_url.description: Valid YouTube video URL to extract audio from. Must be public video

fileName.description: Custom name for output audio file. If omitted, uses input filename or video title

audio_file.description: Path to processed audio file with isolated voice content

characters_used.description: Characters consumed from ElevenLabs API quota for this request

characters_remaining.description: Remaining character quota in ElevenLabs API after this request
